def.en: he tells his (own) story, he narrates
he moves as he sits, sits elsewhere
he changes his abode, his country
he moves as he lies, lies in new place
he lies down in the shade
he (sun, moon) has gone behind cloud
it goes behind an obstacle to vision
he runs behind an obstacle to vision
he is behind an obstacle to vision
it blows ashore, sails to land
he puts his arm round him, hugs him
he climbs up, goes up stairs
successively, one joining to the other
he places it so as to join
string of beads tied end to end
he ties it (them) end to end
it is tied end to end
he uses him; he does him service
he unharnesses him, unties him by tool
he comes from war with scalps
he bites it so as to untie
way on the body, to the waist
across the stream, to the far bank
he makes a bridge; he fords
here and there among the rest
he is greedy, he is stingy
he stops for a rest in flight
he tells the sacred story of it
he tells the sacred story of him
he tells him a sacred story
he tells of it for him
it is the same; it is
he is the same; he is
it is land with clumps of trees
windigo with face on both sides
at both sides of the road
he throws h'self on his face, all fours
he bruises him, makes him black and blue
he is burnt black and blue
it is net-like structure of boards
at the far side of the place
in the land across the water
at the far side of the fire
there is an epidemic of colds
in succession, one after the other
he picks it out from a series
he floats, sits on the water
he ties a compress on himself
he ties a compress on him
he is perched up on something
he hangs snagged on a tree
he hangs it up for him
he takes it out of the water
wagon cover of cloth or leather
he takes him from water/fire by tool
he takes it from water/fire by hand
he takes him from water/fire by hand
he fishes with a seine net
he knocks it from water by tool
he knocks him out of water, fire by tool
he puts meat or fish on drying stage
he places a mat for himself
he piles him up as wood
he puts him, them together in heap
he is given to feeding people
he ties it into a lump
he grows in a clump, mass
it grows in a clump, mass
he places things there, he bets
he rejects him, puts him back
he forces him back by advancing
at the little rockies (place in usa)
he is tied close to something
he ties himself fast to something
he includes himself, he counts himself in
he holds, mixes it with something
he has raw wounds on his back
he lies in wait watching for him
it is a green, blue string
moss, powdered wood for swaddling bag
he comes next after him (in age)
they come one after the other
he ties own head in head rest
he eats a relish with his food
plant leaves, bark to be mixed with tobacco
he ties own legs on leg rest
he uses it for pillow or bed
he lies with his head on something
he scares it off for him
they bet, place things for e.o.
he places things for him, bets with him
he places things for him, bets with him
it is bright day, good weather
they place things for each other, bet
he is on his guard against it
he is on his guard against him
he greets him, bids him farewell
he sees him going your way
he lies with buttocks your way
he noises it going yon way
he eats something along with meat
he employs people (eg. for magic, medecine)
he pretends to be a child
he carries him off on his shoulders
he pulls him away with him
at the other side of the house
he runs round behind an obstacle to vision
he throws self to other side of obst.
he goes round it by canoe
he (sun) sets, goes behind obstacle to vision
he takes part in a poletakes partdance
someone, some people (an sg, an pl)
he lays it together as cloth
place of residence, state of being
he is a hypocrite, pretends to pray
he prays to him, worships him
he has red flesh showing round eyes
he makes signs to him, move
for, because, so it is, cannot be changed
it is too deep in the water
he enlarges self at belly w. sticks
he is taller than someone else
he is such and such a creature
it is such and such a thing
he makes merry at his expense
